ygData.subject: Re: Instruments in dual wield
ygData.msgSnippet: Believe it or not Sylly I got one off a dead gnoll pup in Qeynos Newbie Zone when I was 2nd level, had it for a long time........ Jaez ... From: James Schuldes
ygData.messageBody:
Believe it or not Sylly I got one off a dead gnoll pup in Qeynos Newbie Zone
when I was 2nd level, had it for a long time........

Jaez
-----Original Message-----
From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, August 01, 1999 10:42 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Instruments in dual wield


>From: "James Schuldes" <jgs@...>
>
>Ya, I saw someone holding 2 weps and gueesed they were 15 and was told
o -
>only 10 or something. I said but i see you got 2 weps - wtf????
>
>Parry dagger! I never knew this -- i woulda had one long ago. I guess they
>will look like a wep but give you a dex or agi boost? Which ever boosts
the
>aboility to parry.
>
>Where do you get them? No clue - I am looking in shops now though.
>
>Sylly.
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: jay schultze <sartori69@...>
>To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Date: Saturday, July 31, 1999 6:18 PM
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Instruments in dual wield
>
>
>>From: "jay schultze" <sartori69@...>
>>
>>>From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>
>>>
>>>
>>>Instrument always goes in second melee slot, but you can never put
>anything
>>>in the first melee slot with the instrument. You have 4 options, sing
and
>>>fight with weapons, stand back and play instruments, a combination of the
>>>2,
>>>or play instruments and punch with your fists for about 1-5 damage a
>round.
>>>
>>
>>Some ppl can fool ya - I saw a guy with his lute equipped and a mino axe
in
>>his throwing slot - it looked like he was dual wielding them. He wasn't
>even
>>high enough to dual wield =)
>>
>>Sartori D'Elsiraad
>>Bard of Kelethin of the 37th Chorus
>>Veeshan
>>
